entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , La Grande-Quatre
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:59 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -33.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Grande IV Airport 01:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -33.7°C
Pressure: 102.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 69 %

Dewpoint: -37.4°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 42 this evening and minus 51 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 52 in the morning and minus 39 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
